title: ICAI CA Examinations, May 2026 – Important Dates Announced!
content:
# ICAI CA Examinations, May 2026 – Important Dates Announced!

Ek important update hai! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne Chartered Accountants Examinations, May 2026 ke liye tentative schedule aur important application dates announce kar diye hain. This announcement, released on December 12, 2025, provides clarity for students planning their upcoming exams.

Here’s a quick rundown of the key details:

*   **Announcement Date:** December 12, 2025.
*   **Examination Schedule (May 2026):**
    *   **Final Course:**
        *   Group I: May 2, 4 & 6, 2026.
        *   Group II: May 8, 10 & 12, 2026.
    *   **Intermediate Course:**
        *   Group I: May 3, 5 & 7, 2026.
        *   Group II: May 9, 11 & 13, 2026.
    *   **Foundation Course:** May 14, 16, 18 & 20, 2026.
    *   **International Taxation – Assessment Test (INTT-AT):** May 10 & 12, 2026.
*   **Examination Timings:** Most papers will be held from 2 PM to 5 PM (3 hours), except Foundation Papers 3 & 4 (2 PM to 4 PM) and Final Paper 6 & INTT-AT (2 PM to 6 PM). A 15-minute advance reading time will be provided for descriptive papers.
*   **Online Application Dates:**
    *   **Commencement of Submission:** March 3, 2026.
    *   **Last Date (Without Late Fee):** March 16, 2026.
    *   **Last Date (With Late Fee of ₹600):** March 19, 2026.
    *   **Correction Window (for city/medium change):** March 20 to March 22, 2026.
*   **Application Portal:** All candidates must apply online through the Self Service Portal (SSP) at `https://eservices.icai.org`.

Students are advised to review the detailed notification carefully for complete information regarding exam centres, eligibility criteria, and other guidelines.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.icai.org/new_category.html?cid=1010)

*Published on: 13 December 2025*
